mapper.select: SELECT no AS noticeNo, writer_no AS writerNo, title, content, DATE(created_at) AS regDate, view_counts AS views, CASE WHEN is_important = 'Y' THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS important, category AS categoryString FROM notices ORDER BY is_important DESC, created_at DESC

SELECT no AS noticeNo, writer_no AS writerNo, title, content, DATE(created_at) AS regDate, view_counts AS views, CASE WHEN is_important = 'Y' THEN TRUE ELSE FALSE END AS important, category AS categoryString FROM notices WHERE no = #{noticeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notices ( category, title, content, is_important, writer_no) VALUES ( #{categoryString}, #{title}, #{content}, CASE WHEN #{important} THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END, #{writerNo} )
